scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dev:ollama: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { $port=11434; try { (Invoke-RestMethod -Uri http://127.0.0.1:$port/api/tags -TimeoutSec 2) | Out-Null; Write-Host 'Ollama already running on port' $port; while (Get-Process -Name ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { Start-Sleep -Seconds 30 } } catch { Write-Host 'Starting Ollama server...'; Get-Process -Name ollama -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; ollama serve } }"
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
